title: Dinnerbone：将会挑选几位测试者
author: Neubulaeko
txt_content:
本帖最后由 891215991 于 2013-11-21 19:58 编辑 

看不到请看这里

Nathan Adams @Dinnerbone
Remember to link up your Twitch account athttps://t.co/9WX4sUO8kI to be able to use the new streaming functionality!

Nathan Adams @Dinnerbone
Will probably give a copy of the twitch build to a few streamers today for some more testing before the snapshot. Who wants? :)



1.（由于是倒序，所以1.其实是2.）记得在https://account.mojang.com/me/settings把Twitch账户绑定哦！，这样才能实况！
2.（由于是倒序……[废话!]好吧……）我们大概会给某些实况主一些Twitch测试客户端，谁要？
